title: Join Our Start Solo Hub on WhatsApp
subtitle: Connect with like-minded solopreneurs and get exclusive resources, complementary premium tool access in our WhatsApp community
leftDescription: Our WhatsApp community is the perfect place to stay connected, get support, and access exclusive resources on your solo journey.

leftFeatures.title: Supportive Community
leftFeatures.description: Connect with fellow solopreneurs who understand your challenges

leftFeatures.title: Event Notifications
leftFeatures.description: Be the first to know about upcoming speaker sessions and workshops

leftFeatures.title: Exclusive Resources
leftFeatures.description: Get access to premium tools, templates, guides, AI hacks, and tools not available elsewhere

rightFeatures.title: Weekly Tips & Challenges
rightFeatures.description: Actionable business tips and mini-challenges to help you make consistent progress

rightFeatures.title: Speaker Session Access
rightFeatures.description: Join exclusive Q&As with industry experts and successful entrepreneurs

rightFeatures.title: Resource Library
rightFeatures.description: Access our growing library of templates, checklists, and guides

rightFeatures.title: Networking Opportunities
rightFeatures.description: Connect with potential collaborators, clients, and mentors

howToJoinCard.title: How to Join
howToJoinCard.description: Joining our WhatsApp Hub is completely free and takes just seconds. Simply click the button below to join.
howToJoinCard.note: Note: All session participants and course students are automatically invited to join.
